title: Reading the Build Log
why: ExitCode=25 is just the symptom. The actual error always appears BEFORE the exit code line. Learning to read the log backward from the failure point reveals the root cause.
evidence: Common LogCook and LogPakFile error patterns

items: Identify the FIRST error (root cause, not cascading errors)
Note the log category (LogCook, LogPakFile, LogShaderCompilers)
